title: Git & GitHub 101
description: Learn the fundamentals of version control with Git and collaboration on GitHub. This workshop will cover basic commands, branching, pull requests, and best practices for team development.

title: DSA Bootcamp (4 weeks)
description: A comprehensive 4-week bootcamp focusing on Data Structures and Algorithms. Topics include arrays, linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, searching, and algorithm complexity analysis.

title: HackAITM 24-Hour Hackathon
description: Our flagship hackathon! A 24-hour coding marathon where students form teams to build innovative solutions for real-world problems. Prizes, mentorship, and networking opportunities available.

title: Web Development Workshop Series
description: A series of hands-on workshops covering modern web development. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and backend development with Node.js and Express.

title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to machine learning concepts and techniques. Explore supervised and unsupervised learning, model evaluation, and practical implementation using Python and popular libraries.
